Module kivakit.microservice
Package com.telenav.kivakit.microservice.protocols.rest.http

Interface Restful

All Superinterfaces:
com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Broadcaster, com.telenav.kivakit.component.Component, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Listener, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.MessageTransceiver, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.naming.Nameable, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.naming.NamedObject, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.messaging.Receiver, com.telenav.kivakit.core.registry.RegistryTrait, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Repeater, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Transceiver, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.messaging.Transmitter
All Known Subinterfaces:
MicroservletRequest, MicroservletResponse, RestProblemReportingTrait, RestRequest, RestResponse
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseMicroservletRequest, BaseMicroservletResponse, BaseMounted, HealthLiveRequest, HealthLiveRequest.HealthLiveResponse, HealthReadyRequest, HealthReadyRequest.HealthReadyResponse, JettyMicroservletFilter, JettyRestRequest, JettyRestRequestCycle, JettyRestResponse, MicroservletErrorResponse, MountedApi, MountedMicroservlet, OpenApiJsonRequest, OpenApiJsonRequest.JettyOpenApiResponse
public interface Restful extends com.telenav.kivakit.component.Component
Base interface for RestRequest and RestResponse, as well as MicroservletRequest and MicroservletResponse. Provides easy access to RestRequestCycle, RestRequest, RestResponse, RestService, and to JSON serialization.

Ownership

  • restService() - The rest service that owns this
  • microservice() - The microservice that owns this
  • version() - The version of microservice()

Request Cycle

  • restRequestCycle() - The current request cycle
  • restRequest() - The current request
  • restResponse() - The current response

Serialization

  • fromJson(String, Class) - Converts JSON to an object
  • toJson(Object) - Converts an object to JSON
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)

    • toJson

      default String toJson(Object response)
      Parameters:
      response - The response object to be serialized
      Returns:
      The object serialized into JSON format, using the application GsonFactory. This behavior can be overridden by implementing GsonFactorySource to provide a custom GsonFactory for a given response object.

      default com.telenav.kivakit.core.version.Version version()
